title: Jina Web Reader
overviewMarkdown: This plugin fetches web pages via Jina

openaiSpec.name: jina_web_reader

url.description: The URL of the webpage to read

includeImages.description: Whether to include images in the response

openaiSpec.description: Fetch the entire content of a web page Jina.ai's web reader with options for images

openaiSpec.name: jina_serp_search
openaiSpec.description: Search the web using Jina SERP API and return top results (titles and links only).

openaiSpec.name: jina_serp_full_results
openaiSpec.description: Search the web and return the top 5 results with their URLs and full content using Jina Reader.

openaiSpec.name: jina_deep_search

messages.description: Conversation history as an array of message objects with 'role' and 'content'.

reasoning_effort.description: Reasoning effort: low, medium, or high.

openaiSpec.description: Perform a deep search using Jina Deep Search API for advanced, up-to-date answers.

userSettings.name: jinaApiKey
userSettings.label: Jina API Key
userSettings.description: Your API key for accessing Jina.ai services
